project.name: noreport
project.description: Shows how final documents can be created without using the reporting engine, but only the API directly.

target.name: javac
target.description: Compiles the java source files of the test application.

target.name: fill
target.description: Fills the compiled report design with data and produces the .jrprint file.

target.name: view
target.description: Launches the report viewer to preview the report stored in the .jrprint file.

target.name: viewXML
target.description: Launches the report viewer to preview the generated report stored in an XML file.

target.name: print
target.description: Sends the report in the .jrprint file to the printer.

target.name: pdf
target.description: Generates a PDF version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xml
target.description: Generates an XML version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xmlEmbed
target.description: Generates an XML version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: html
target.description: Generates an HTML version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: rtf
target.description: Generates an RTF version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: xls
target.description: Generates an XLS version of the report by converting the .jrprint file using the POI library.

target.name: jxl
target.description: Generates an XLS version of the report by converting the .jrprint file using the JExcelApi library.

target.name: csv
target.description: Generates a CSV version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.

target.name: odt
target.description: Generates an ODT version of the report by converting the .jrprint file.
